TUH, Hard Polyurethane Tube
TUH, Hard Polyurethane Tube, High Pressure Type
TUS, Series TJ Inner Sleeve
branchItem.description: The Series TJ Inner Sleeve reinforces soft polyurethane tubing (TUS). Insert an inner sleeve into the end of soft polyurethane tubing when using a One-Touch™ fitting. Always use an inner sleeve in a safety circuit or critical area.
